fields.name: God's Wrath (Passive):
fields.value: If the host is executed, town loses, and everyone who opposes town wins, even if you're dead. This role cannot coexist with Post 97 "Athiest"

fields.name: Town Spirits (Passive):
fields.value: Even if you are dead, roles aren't revealed upon death and dead players can still speak in day chat and hello neighbor.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the fall of the unfaithful town
